resources.string: You do not have permission to use this feature.
To accept payments and order your card reader, activate your account.
Square’s Seller Agreement and E-Sign Consent
Square’s User Agreement and Privacy Policy
Square’s Seller Agreement and Privacy Policy
Square’s Terms, Privacy Policy and E-Sign Consent
You have not taken a payment yet.
You can search by receipt, card number or you can insert a card.
You can search by receipt, card number, or you can insert or tap a card.
Enter a receipt number to search.
Enter a receipt number, card number, or swipe.
You can search by receipt, or you can swipe or insert a card.
You can search by receipt, or you can insert, swipe or tap a card.
Insert, swipe, or enter a receipt or card number.
Tap, insert, swipe, or enter a receipt or card number.
Enter your bank account details so we can directly deposit your funds.
Tip amounts are listed separately in your sales reports.
Item edits were saved. Unable to add stock at this time. Please check your network connection and try again.
Your last payment for {amount} was automatically completed after a period of inactivity. Tap to view your Sales History for details.
{percent}% gratuity is added for parties of {number} or more.
Square Point of Sale experienced a problem and could not process your last payment for {amount}.
Your last payment for {amount} was automatically cancelled after a period of inactivity.
You can add tip and settle this transaction on iPad or Dashboard.

To verify this account we’ll withdraw $0.01 and then refund the charge. Make sure you have at least $1.00 in your bank account to prevent your bank verification from failing due to insufficient funds.
We were unable to link your bank account. Please visit the Support Centre for more details.
Enter your bank account details so we can directly deposit your funds.
The account numbers you entered were not the same. Please double-check and correct them.
To learn more about supported barcode scanners and how to set them up, visit the {support_center}.
Loyalty Was Disabled in POS During This Transaction
Failed to Connect to Loyalty During This Transaction
Not a Qualifying Item or Category
No Active Loyalty Subscription for This Transaction
Your POS Was Offline During This Transaction
Purchase Did Not Qualify to Earn {points_plural}
A New Sale Was Started Before Loyalty Check-In

{name} ({serial_number}) is currently paired with another Point of Sale. ‘Forget’ the reader from the other Point of Sale or reset the reader by holding down the power button until the lights flash red.
Square failed to pair with {name} ({serial_number}). Press and hold the power button until the lights continuously flash red.
Please update Square in order to use your Square Reader for Contactless + Chip Cards
To accept payments with Square, you must first close any audio recording apps. Please restart your device if this message persists.
{count} transactions did not settle with tip. Would you like to retry?
1 transaction did not settle with tip. Would you like to retry?
Please verify the card number, expiration date, and CVV/security code.
Please Swipe Card\nChip Card Not\nCurrently Supported
Please Sign Here\n(If Customer Is Present)
How do you want to receive your digital receipts?
How would you like your receipt?
I, {cardholder_name}, agree to pay the above total amount according to my card issuer agreement. {card_brand_phrase} ending in {card_suffix}. Authorisation code {auth_number}. {refund_policy}
I, {cardholder_name}, agree to pay the above total amount according to my card issuer agreement. {card_brand_phrase} ending in {card_suffix}. {refund_policy}
I agree to pay the above total amount according to my card issuer agreement. {card_brand_phrase} ending in {card_suffix}. Authorisation code {auth_number}. {refund_policy}
I agree to pay the above total amount according to my card issuer agreement. {card_brand_phrase} ending in {card_suffix}. {refund_policy}
Please try another card or contact your bank.
This transaction includes previously authorised payments. Are you sure you want to cancel?
Are you sure you want to cancel verification of this bank account?
Create gift cards on your web Dashboard.
Edit this gift card on your web Dashboard.
Please connect to the Internet to complete your unfinished payment.
Please connect to the Internet to complete unfinished payments.
The card was not charged. Please check your network settings and try again later.
You are charging {amount} to {customer_name}’s {card_brand} ending in {last_four}
Card processing is not enabled for your account. For more information, visit the {support_center}.
For help troubleshooting Square Reader, visit the {support_center}.
For help troubleshooting Square Reader, visit the {support_center}.
The card was not charged. Please try again later.
The card was not charged. Please check Google Play for an updated app.
Cash drawers connected via a receipt printer will not appear here. To learn more about supported cash drawers and how to set them up, visit the {support_center}.
Automatically send an email report after ending a drawer.
Automatically print report after ending a drawer.
Cash Management enables you to track the cash that goes in and out of your drawer.
Disabling Cash Management will end the current drawer.
Deleting a Category will not delete Items assigned to it.
Provide a name for this category.
Insert, Swipe or Enter Card Number
Insert, Swipe or Enter Card Number
Insert, Swipe, Tap or Enter Card Number
Apple Pay, Android Pay and tap card linking are not supported.
Swipe, Insert or Key-in Card Number

Having an incorrect date & time can lead to failed payment processing as well as produce errors in your transaction activity and reporting. \n\n To make adjustments to your device date & time, please visit your device Settings. Once your date & time has been corrected, relaunch Square to begin accepting credit cards.
Your Device Date & Time Settings Appears to be Incorrect.
Contact your bank to trace any deposits that may have been sent to your closed account. Then, link an open bank account to receive deposits. {learn_more}.
The card number you entered appears to be for a gift card. Please enter a valid credit card number.
The card number you entered appears to be for a credit card. Please enter a valid gift card number.
Comping ticket will comp all existing items and result in a {zero_amount} total.
Complete the payment in progress before viewing Transactions.
You have created tax rules that may omit certain taxes based on the selected dining option. View and edit rules on your {dashboard}.
You have created Tax Rules for Dining Options. These will have an effect on how taxes are omitted based on the dining option you have selected. View and edit tax rules on your {dashboard}.
Select a price for this item.
You will not receive a deposit for this transaction. Cash payments are recorded for reporting purposes only.
Unable to connect to the Internet.
Action needs to be taken on the payment device.
This card cannot be used for this contactless transaction. Please insert the chip card or try a different card now.
This card cannot be used for this contactless transaction. Please try a different card now.
More than one card has been detected within range.
Choose Contactless below for tap payments
A contactless card reader needs to be connected to Square Point of Sale to process this refund.
Unlock the payment device and try again.
Please tap your contactless device or card on the reader.
Correct the postal code and try again.
Macedonia, the former Yugoslav Republic of
Payments can only be processed in the country you selected.
Secure your account with a strong password.
Coupons can only be applied to a purchase if the total is $1.00 or more after the coupon has been applied. All coupons are single use only and not transferable.
Please set a valid email address.
Something went wrong. Please try again.
Receive email receipts when your saved card is used for purchases.
By providing your email address, you agree that {merchant_name} may send you marketing messages via Square. See your digital receipt for privacy policy and preferences.
By providing your email address, you agree that {merchant_name} may send you messages via Square. See your digital receipt for privacy policy and preferences.
Card on File Not Available Offline
Name and email will be used to create a new customer profile.
Failed to remove card, please try again.
Revoke your authorisation at any time by contacting {merchant_name} or from your digital receipt.
{cardowner_name}, enter your Billing Postal Code to authorise your {cardname} for future purchases at {merchant_name}.
{cardowner_name}, enter your Billing Postcode to authorise your card for future purchases at {merchant_name}.
{cardowner_name}, enter your Billing Postcode to authorise your {cardname} for future purchases at {merchant_name}.
{cardowner_name}, enter your Billing Postcode to authorise your card for future purchases at {merchant_name}.
{cardowner_name}, enter your Billing Postcode to authorise {merchant_name} to store your {cardname} with Square and to charge this card for your future purchases until you cancel this authorisation.
{cardowner_name}, enter your Billing Postcode to authorise {merchant_name} to store your card with Square and to charge this card for your future purchases until you cancel this authorisation.
{cardowner_name}, enter your Billing Zip Code to authorise your {cardname} for future purchases at {merchant_name}.
{cardowner_name}, enter your Billing Postcode to authorise your card for future purchases at {merchant_name}.
You are about to delete this customer profile. This can’t be undone.
Sorry, customer could not be deleted. Please try again later.
Sorry, customer could not be loaded. Please try again later.
Sorry, card could not be read. Please try again.
Sorry, customer could not be saved. Please try again later.
An error occurred, please try again later.
Sorry, conversation could not be loaded. Please try again later.
Sorry, this customer does not allow responses.
Are you sure you want to void {number} coupons? This action cannot be undone.
Are you sure you want to void the coupon? This action cannot be undone.
Leaving this screen will prevent the customer from saving their card.
Collect customer details and link a sale to a customer before checkout begins. Tap ‘Add Customer’ in the drop down menu at the top of your cart.
Collect customer details and link a sale to a customer after checkout is complete. Tap the customer icon next to the ‘New Sale’ button on the receipt or confirmation screen.
Save a card to a customer profile that can be used in future transactions.
Show a Save Card button after checkout to save a card used in a transaction directly on the receipt or confirmation screen.

By providing your contact information, you agree businesses you frequent may send you digital receipts, marketing, and messages via Square. See your digital receipt for privacy policy and preferences.

Your information will be used by Square and this merchant to provide their services. By providing your contact information, you agree this merchant and other Square merchants may send you digital receipts and messages via Square. See your digital receipt for Square’s Privacy Policy and preferences.

By providing your contact information, you agree this merchant and other merchants using Square may send you digital receipts and messages via Square. See your digital receipt for Square’s Privacy Policies and preferences.

Your information will be used by Square and this merchant to provide their services. By providing your contact information, you agree this merchant and other Square merchants may send you digital receipts and messages via Square. Your contact information is not visible to other Square merchants unless you provide it directly to that merchant. See your digital receipt for Square’s Privacy Policy and preferences.
Let’s stay in touch! Join our mailing list for news and offers.
If you have an active Loyalty program, these email collection screens may not appear.
Add a screen after checkout inviting customers to sign up for your mailing list. This would only appear if a customer has not signed up for an email receipt. Learn more in the {support_center_link}.
Sorry, groups could not be loaded. Please try again.
Sorry, group could not be saved. Please try again.
The loyalty account for {phone_number} will be deleted. This action cannot be undone.
Failed to delete Loyalty Account. Please try again.
Tapping send will trigger an SMS to {phone} with their current loyalty balance.
This customer has no upcoming expiries.
Sorry, note could not be deleted. Please try again.
Sorry, note could not be saved. Please try again.
This will remove the selected file from {customer_name}’s profile. This action can’t be undone.
Sorry, message could not be sent. Please try again.
Messages should not be used to send marketing communications.
The phone {number} is associated with another customer’s loyalty account.
We’re sorry, but something went wrong.
This is the phone number used to earn {plural_points_terminology} and rewards.
This is the phone number used to earn stars and rewards.
Use Customer Checkout to prompt the customer to Swipe, Insert or Tap to pay for faster checkout. Use Standard Checkout to show all payment types.
When this setting is on, customers will see an itemised view of their order before paying.
Save a card to this customer in the customer directory before or after a sale. To learn more about cards on file, visit the {support_center}.
Starting a new sale will prevent the customer from getting a receipt.
This Square location cannot process payments using the Square Reader SDK. It may be registered in a country where use of the SDK is not supported.
{operation_name} was called from an activity that is already destroyed.
This device is already authorised for a Square location. To authorise with a different location, call AuthorisationManager#deauthorise() first.

The provided amount is above the maximum amount allowed for cards at the authorised Square location. Add at least one AdditionalPaymentType or check the maximum amount with Location#getMaximumCardPaymentAmountMoney before starting a transaction.

The provided amount is below the minimum amount allowed for card payments at the authorised Square location. Add at least one AdditionalPaymentType or check the minimum amount with Location#getMinimumCardPaymentAmountMoney before starting a transaction.
Authorisation is already in progress. Please wait for AuthorisationManager#authorise to complete.
The Square Reader SDK could not complete the authorise request because there was no network connection.

The authorised Square location is not activated for card processing. Please check whether the location can process cards using Location#isCardProcessingActivated. Merchants can complete the activation process at https://www.squareup.com/activate
A checkout operation is already in progress and a card has been presented for payment. Ensure that the in-progress checkout is complete before calling CheckoutManager#startCheckoutActivity again.

This device must be authorised with a Square location in order to take payments. Obtain an authorisation code for a Square location from the mobile/authorisation-code endpoint and then call AuthorisationManager#authorise.
Square Reader SDK authorisation codes are one-time-use only. This authorisation code has already been used to authorise a device.
{operation_name} was called from a context that has a loop through its context delegation chain.
{operation_name} must be called with a context that is either an activity or a context wrapping an Activity
{operation_name} was attempted from a null context.
Authorisation is currently in progress. Please wait for AuthorisationManager#authorise to complete.

The Square Reader SDK cannot deauthorise because there are asynchronous payments on this device waiting to upload to Square servers. This can happen when the device is having network connection issues.
{operation_name} was called a second time before a previous call was able to execute.
The provided authorisation code is an empty string.
The provided custom tip percentages array is empty. You must provide one or more tip percentages or enable custom tips. Alternatively, disable tipping with CheckoutParameters.Builder#noTip.
This authorisation code has expired. Square Reader SDK authorisation codes are short-lived and should not be stored.
The presented gift card does not have sufficient funds to complete the transaction, and split tender is disabled. Enable split tender to avoid this error.
The authorisation code is invalid. The authorisation code may have been requested with a Square Application ID different from the one associated with this application.
The provided currency code does not match the currency of the authorised Square location. Check the currency of the authorised location with CurrencyCode#current.
The provided customer id does not match any known customer. Probably it is just an incorrect value, but it may be that the customer has been deleted since you got the identifier.
The provided tip percentages are invalid. Please provide percentages with values between 1 and 100, inclusive.
The amount must not be negative.
This operation was attempted on a thread that is not the main thread.
The provided authorisation code is null.
ReaderSettingsActivity was cancelled by the user.

This device must be authorised with a Square location in order to connect a reader. Obtain an authorisation code for a Square location from the mobile/authorisation-code endpoint and then call AuthorisationManager#authorise.
The checkout operation was cancelled because another call to CheckoutManager#startCheckoutActivity was made before the checkout operation could complete.
The user cancelled the storage of card-on-file information.
Too many tip percentages were provided. Please provide up to 3 tip percentages.
The Square Reader SDK encountered an unexpected error. Please contact Square developer support via http://squareup.com/help/contact
Square could not retrieve the result for {operation_name} because the installed fragment has been replaced.
Choose Custom to toggle Same-Day or 1–2 Working Day deposits on a per-day basis below.

Payments taken before 5:00 pm PT / 8:00 pm ET will be available in your bank account the next business day. Payments taken after 5:00 pm PT / 8:00 pm ET will be available in your bank account by the second business day. If you set your Close of Day after 5:00 pm PT / 8:00 pm ET, sales for your entire day will be available the second business day.

Payments taken before 12 AM Melbourne time will be available in your bank account the next business day. Payments taken after 12 AM Melbourne time will be available in your bank account by the second business day. If you set your Close of Day after 12 AM Melbourne time, sales for your entire day will be available the second business day.

Payments taken before 24:00 will be available in your bank account the next business day. Payments taken after 24:00 will be available in your bank account by the second business day. If you set your Close of Day after 24:00, sales for your entire day will be available the second business day.
Square deposits your eligible balance into your linked bank account after you’ve manually triggered an Instant Deposit.
Square deposits your eligible balance into the bank account associated with your linked debit card after you’ve manually triggered an Instant Deposit.
Something went wrong. Please contact the developer of this application and provide them with this error code: {debug_code}
The device name is used in reports to indicate which device processed a transaction. This is helpful if multiple devices share the same account.
The fingerprint of your app cannot be verified.
The CUSTOMER_ID parameter was passed, but the merchant account does not support Customer Management.
{error_description} Ensure your registered Package Name is {package_name} and the associated Fingerprint is {fingerprint} on https://connect.squareup.com/apps/{client_id}/point-of-sale-api.
The LOCATION_ID parameter does not match the ID of the business location currently logged in to Square Point of Sale.
The API version value does not match the provided request intent keys.
The amount to be charged must be a non-negative integer.
The app client id is unknown.
The CURRENCY_CODE parameter is {parameter}, which does not match the currency of the logged in merchant: {merchant_currency}.
The app fingerprint does not match any of the expected fingerprints.
The CLIENT_ID parameter is a sandbox ID. Sandbox IDs are not supported in Point of Sale API. Please use a production client ID.

Point of Sale API must be started with startActivityForResult() in the same task. It looks like the caller either used startActivity() or used startActivityForResult() from a finished activity or with the FLAG_ACTIVITY_NEW_TASK flag.
The AUTO_RETURN_TIMEOUT_MS parameter must be non-negative.
The CALLBACK_URL parameter does not match any of the expected web callback URLs. Register a callback URL in the Square Developer Portal.
The API Version parameter must be set.
The TOTAL_AMOUNT parameter must be set.
The CLIENT_ID parameter must be set.
The CURRENCY_CODE parameter must be set.
Square Point of Sale did not provide a result.
Cannot retrieve the app signature, is it signed?
The TENDER_TYPES parameter must contain at least one known tender type.
The callback_url parameter must be set for Web API requests.
An employee passcode must be entered in to Square Point of Sale.
Square Point of Sale could not connect to the internet.
Square Point of Sale could not connect to its servers.
The NOTE parameter is longer than 500 characters
The AUTO_RETURN_TIMEOUT_MS parameter is greater than 10000 ms (inclusive).
The AUTO_RETURN_TIMEOUT_MS parameter is lower than 3200 ms.
A transaction is already in progress.
This transaction was cancelled because a newer request was made before this transaction could complete.
The app package name is unknown.
The installed version of Square is too old, it doesn’t support this version of the Point of Sale SDK.
Web API is not supported in the supplied API_VERSION parameter. Please update the API_VERSION to at least v1.3.
The merchant must be logged in to Square Point of Sale.
Are you sure you want to discard the payment?
Are you sure you want to discard the entire payment?
Are you sure you want to remove {tender_details}?
Leave the discount amount blank to enter at the time of sale. Discounts are applied to the ticket before tax is calculated.
Provide a name for this discount.
Please add an item that qualifies for the discount.
The customer display was disconnected. The last payment for {amount} was successfully processed.
The customer display was disconnected. The last payment for {amount} could not be processed.
We encountered an error loading this file. Please try again.
The gift card has already been added to the cart.
SKUs {first_duplicate_sku}, {second_duplicate_sku} and {count} others already exist in your library.
SKU {duplicate_sku} already exists in your library as {first_item}, {second_item} and {count} others.
SKU {duplicate_sku} already exists in your library as {item}.
SKU {duplicate_sku} already exists in your library as {first_item}, {second_item} and {third_item}.
SKU {duplicate_sku} already exists in your library as {first_item} and {second_item}.
SKUs {first_duplicate_sku}, {second_duplicate_sku} and {third_duplicate_sku} already exist in your library.
SKUs {first_duplicate_sku} and {second_duplicate_sku} already exist in your library.
Please enter a value from {min_value} to {max_value}. Leave the field blank to enter at the time of sale.
Provide a name for this gift card.
Leave value blank to enter Gift Card amount upon sale.
Do you want to resume editing or discard these changes?
Pinch or drag to adjust the size and position.
We were unable to process your request.\nPlease try again.
You have {mins_left} minutes left.\nWould you like to end this break?
Your break was scheduled to end at {break_end_time}
You have 1 minute left.\nWould you like to end this break?
You have <1 minute left.\nWould you like to end this break?
We were unable to process your request.\nPlease try again.
This break is scheduled to end at {break_end_time}
Clock in to start your shift
No shifts worked so far today
Control which employees can edit items, process refunds or review sales reports. View and edit settings on your {dashboard}.
Allow Guest Access to Square Point of Sale
When guest access is disabled, each employee will need a passcode to access Point of Sale.
Select which job you are clocking in as
Enable employee passcode access to secure your Point of Sale. Set up employee roles and permissions on your {dashboard}.
Track Time from Point of Sale
Enable time tracking to clock in and out on this device. If you have permission, you can view and edit timecards on Square Dashboard.
Enable time tracking to allow employees to clock in and out of Point of Sale. You can view and edit their timecards on your Square Dashboard.
Please update Square in order to get the latest firmware for your Square Reader for Chip Cards
Please insert the card to continue.
The attached reader is not yet supported on this device.
This chip card must be inserted.
This is your final PIN attempt.
Internet connectivity is required to use the Chip Reader.
For your security, this reader has been deactivated. To request a replacement, please contact Support.
This card must swiped to search.
This card must be tapped or swiped to search.
Return to checkout to tap card if it supports contactless payments or try a different payment method.
Square does not currently support this chip card.
Please disconnect and reconnect the reader.
This card cannot be used for this contactless transaction. Insert chip card or return to checkout to try a different payment method or contactless card.
Please enable location services, device storage and phone access to accept payments with Square.
Expiration date M M / Y Y
{points_terminology} expire {expiration_period} {expiration_unit} after earning at the end of the month.
Restore Internet connectivity immediately to process expiring payments.
This feature is not supported in this version of Square Point of Sale.
Press and hold anywhere on the grid to begin arranging items.
Ready to take your first payment? All you need is a credit card.
Open your Account to view sales, resend a receipt or issue a refund.
This version of the Square card reader is no longer supported. Request the latest reader for free now to continue accepting credit cards.
You have not enabled Square gift cards in your account. Please contact our customer service to enable this.
Gift card failed to activate. Please try again.
Gift card will not be activated until checkout is complete.
Use {gift_card_cash_out} to exchange the balance of a gift card for cash.
Use {gift_card_clear_balance} to set the balance of a refunded gift card to zero.
Cart exceeds the gift card activation limit.
Please swipe a valid gift card.
Plug in the reader via USB\nto charge the battery.
An update to Square is required to use Instant Deposit.
{balance_description} Funds will be sent to the bank account linked to your debit card ending in {pan_suffix}. You can change your linked debit card in {deposits_settings}.
{balance_description} Funds will be available in your {bank_name} account ending in •••••{account_number_suffix} within 20 minutes. You can change your linked bank account in {bank_account_settings}.
We’ve had trouble sending your funds instantly to your debit card. Please try adding your card information again.
To instantly deposit funds, visit the Transactions section of this app.

By default, your Close of Day is {close_of_day} (you can modify this above). Square automatically deposits your funds on the next working day. If you want them faster, choose Same-Day Deposits. {learn_more}.
Instant Deposit allows you to deposit your balance immediately - even on weekends, and costs {fee} of each deposit. Enable Instant Deposit to deposit funds from {transactions}.
Instant Deposit allows you to deposit your balance immediately - even at weekends and costs {fee} of each deposit. Enable Instant Deposit to deposit funds from {transactions} or {deposits}.

Instant Deposit allows you to deposit your balance immediately - even on weekends. Instant Deposit costs {fee} of each deposit, or a flat fee of {minimum_fee_amount} if the deposit is less than {minimum_fee_deposit_limit}. Enable Instant Deposit to deposit funds from {transactions}.

Instant Deposit allows you to deposit your balance immediately - even at weekends. Instant Deposit costs {fee} of each deposit or a flat fee of {minimum_fee_amount} if the deposit is less than {minimum_fee_deposit_limit}. Enable Instant Deposit to deposit funds from {transactions} or {deposits}.

Instant Deposit allows you to deposit your balance immediately and costs {fee} of each deposit. Funds are available in your bank account in 20 minutes or less. Enable Instant Deposit to deposit funds from {transactions}. Your opt in to the Instant Deposit service constitutes your acceptance of the {instant_deposit_terms}.

Instant Deposit allows you to deposit your balance immediately and costs {fee} of each deposit. Funds are available in your bank account in 20 minutes or less. Enable Instant Deposit to deposit funds from {transactions} or {deposits}. Your opt in to the Instant Deposit service constitutes your acceptance of the {instant_deposit_terms}.
Instantly deposited funds will be sent to the account linked to this debit card.
Instant Deposit requires a supported debit card to deposit funds into your associated bank account.
Your link to verify your debit card has expired. Resend the email to receive a new link.
A network error occurred, please try again later.
Instant Deposit allows you to deposit your balance immediately - even at weekends. Enable Instant Deposit to deposit funds from {transactions}.
Instant Deposit allows you to deposit your balance immediately - even at weekends. Enable Instant Deposit to deposit funds from {transactions} or {deposits}.

Instant Deposit allows you to deposit your balance immediately. Funds are available in your bank account in 20 minutes or less. Enable Instant Deposit to deposit funds from {transactions}. Your opt in to the Instant Deposit service constitutes your acceptance of the {instant_deposit_terms}.

Instant Deposit allows you to deposit your balance immediately. Funds are available in your bank account in 20 minutes or less. Enable Instant Deposit to deposit funds from {transactions} or {deposits}. Your opt in to the Instant Deposit service constitutes your acceptance of the {instant_deposit_terms}.
We’ve sent you an email to verify your request to link a debit card. Please verify by clicking the link within 24 hours. If you can’t find the email, check your spam or resend the email.
Instant Deposit is not currently available. Please contact Square Support for more information.
Please click the link in the email within 24 hours to verify your debit card. If you don’t receive an email, it may be in your spam folder.
The 16 digit card number you entered is invalid. Please verify the information, or continue adding for 19 digit cards.
Please enter a valid email address.
Please enter a valid Facebook address.
Please enter a valid routing number.
Update Square to use inventory features.
If your customer opts-in, this will result in a higher transaction fee. {help_center}
If your customer opts in, your transaction fee for those payments will be {cnp_rate}. {help_center}
Thanks for your business! View your invoice using the link below. \n\n {url}
In order to select a custom due date, you must have an invoice that is not recurring.
Could not load most recent default message
You do not have any contacts with an email address associated.
Invoice payments from Point of Sale are not currently supported when Sign on Printed Receipt is enabled. You may disable this option in Settings > Signature and Receipt.
This invoice will repeat every day, starting on {start_date}.
This invoice will repeat every day, starting on {start_date}, ending on {end_date}.
This invoice will repeat every {count} days, starting on {start_date}.
This invoice will repeat every {count} days, starting on {start_date}, ending on {end_date}.
This invoice will repeat every {count} days{end_phrase}
This invoice will repeat every day{end_phrase}
This invoice will repeat every month on day {day_of_month}, starting on {start_date}.
This invoice will repeat every month on the last day of the month, starting on {start_date}.
This invoice will repeat every month on the last day of the month, starting on {start_date}, ending on {end_date}.
This invoice will repeat every month on day {day_of_month}, starting on {start_date}, ending on {end_date}.
This invoice will repeat every {count} months on day {day_of_month}, starting on {start_date}.
This invoice will repeat every {count} months on the last day of the month, starting on {start_date}.
This invoice will repeat every {count} months on the last day of the month, starting on {start_date}, ending on {end_date}.
This invoice will repeat every {count} months on day {day_of_month}, starting on {start_date}, ending on {end_date}.
This invoice will repeat every {count} months{end_phrase}
This invoice will repeat every month{end_phrase}
This invoice will repeat every week on {day_of_week}, starting on {start_date}.
This invoice will repeat every week on {day_of_week}, starting on {start_date}, ending on {end_date}.
This invoice will repeat every {count} weeks on {day_of_week}, starting on {start_date}.
This invoice will repeat every {count} weeks on {day_of_week}, starting on {start_date}, ending on {end_date}.
This invoice will repeat every {count} weeks{end_phrase}

Offline Mode enables you to accept swiped card payments at your normal processing rates when your Internet service is temporarily unavailable. Transactions are processed when you regain Internet connectivity and will expire if not processed within 72 hours.{section_break}By enabling Offline Mode, you are responsible for any expired or declined transactions taken while offline.

Be among the first to preview Open Tickets, a new feature that enables you to save items to orders while leaving the sale open. Now your customers can continue to order throughout their stay and pay when they’re ready.{section_break}We are committed to building you the best tools for your business, and continuing to improve them. As you begin to use Open Tickets, we look forward to your feedback.

For more information on Predefined Tickets and Open Tickets, visit the {support_center}.

Predefined Tickets allow you to create and customise groups for your Open Tickets and reuse ticket names. For example, a ticket group can match your location’s physical layout such as “Bar”. A ticket name inside “Bar” can refer to a seat, such as “Bar 1”.{section_break} You can access ticket group reporting on your Dashboard.
You have reached the limit of {limit} groups. Please remove existing groups before creating others.
Can only create up to {limit} predefined tickets per group
You have reached the limit of {limit} tickets for this group. Please remove existing tickets before creating others.
Predefined Tickets allow you to create ticket groups, reuse ticket names, specify the number of Open Tickets per group and access ticket group reporting on your Dashboard.

Allow chip cards to be swiped with a Square magstripe card reader—even if your Square contactless and chip card reader is connected. Please note that if you swipe chip cards, you are liable for possible EMV card fraud. Learn more in the {support_center}.
Allow Chip Cards to Be Swiped

By swiping chip cards and choosing not to insert them into the EMV card slot of your Square contactless and chip reader, you understand that you are liable for any possible EMV card fraud. Please note that Chargeback Protection does not apply to transactions made with swiped chip cards.{section_break}When enabled, this feature applies to all points of sale connected to this location.
Activate your Square Card by swiping it now.
Tap the current employee to lock the point of sale and enable another employee to sign in using their passcode.
Tap ’Log Out’ to lock the point of sale and enable another employee to sign in using their passcode.
Tap ‘Log Out’ to log out the current employee and return the app to Restricted mode. Tap ‘Log In’ to enable another employee to sign in using their passcode.
Square can autofill forms like this one with your email to make running your business even simpler.
Square can use your contacts to make populating Invoices a breeze.

Location Services must be turned on at all times when using Square. Square needs to know where transactions take place in order to reduce the risks associated with those transactions and to minimise payment disputes.
Square needs access to your microphone in order to use the magstripe card reader.

Square needs phone access in order to uniquely identify the devices associated with your account and ensure that unauthorised devices are not able to act on your behalf. Square will never use or store your phone number or call history.
Square needs to access the device storage system in order to securely process transactions and prevent malicious code from interfering with Square.
Please turn off TalkBack to continue using the Chip Card Reader.
Reader will not work correctly with TalkBack enabled.
You must enter a name for this tax before continuing.
You must enter a tax rate before continuing.

Item pricing allows you to determine whether the tax you are creating is added to the final item price or included in the item price. If it is included, the tax will appear in your reports, but your customers will not see the tax.
Tax rates can be applied to specific items and will be automatically calculated at purchase.
{name} ({percentage}%) can be applied to specific items and will be automatically calculated at purchase.
Please contact support for more information.
This amount (including tip) is used for tracking purposes only. You will not receive a deposit for this transaction.
Would you like to clock in now?
Enable your customers to add gratuity when they sign for their payments. Tip amounts are recorded in your Sales History.
Allow customers to enter a custom tip amount.
Display tip entry on a separate screen.
Payments under $10 enable tip choices in whole dollar amounts.
Add a card to your customer’s profile enabling you to charge them seamlessly in the future.
Take payment on your invoices when and where your customers want to pay, in person or online.
Set up ticket groups with predefined tickets to quickly and easily manage your open tickets.
Comp and Void provide more control and insight when items are removed from a sale.

Allow employees to clock in/out on your point of sale and review their timesheets on Dashboard. Overtime is automatically calculated so you can sync their hours with Square Payroll or export to any payroll provider.{section_break}Visit your Dashboard to start adding employees.
Track Time on Square Point of Sale
Square’s Offline Mode allows you to accept card payments without Internet connectivity.
You have sent your first Invoice. Check your email to see how it looks.
Learn how to send an invoice right to your customer’s email address for free.
You have been signed out due to your 2-Step Verification settings. For help, contact support.
Restore Internet connectivity to process these payments.

We need to update your reader’s firmware. This may take 5 to 10 minutes as the reader reconnects a few times. You can still swipe cards with your magstripe reader during this process. \n\nThe orange status bar at the top of the screen will turn black when the update is finished.
Voiding ticket will cancel all existing item charges and close the ticket immediately.

By default, we keep Friday sales in your balance over the weekend, so you can access them instantly if needed. If you would like your Friday sales sent out on Friday night, disable weekend balance here.
Continue to the web to finish creating your free account.
